extendedInfo.description: It's a new type of puzzle game which makes lots of cute Mijinkos! Tap the blocks to feed Mijinkos in order to produce more! With big combos, rare Mijinkos can appear! â How to Play The rules are simple. Quickly tap at least 3 blocks of the same color that are aligned together. The more you erase, the more Mijinkos you get. Increase your Mijinkos and aim for a high score! â Erase as Many Blocks as You Can at Once You can produce rare Mijinkos when you erase many blocks at once! â Make Combos You can make combos by erasing 3 or more blocks. As you continue making combos, you can produce rare Mijinkos! â Get High Scores Your score depends on the numbers and kinds of Mijinko you get. Produce lots of rare Mijinkos to get a high score! â Use Items By erasing many blocks, you can earn items. Use them at the right time to get a high score! â Play with your Facebook friends! Have even more fun by playing with your Facebook friends!-------------------------------------------------------Mijinko-chan is now on Twitter! Follow me!Twitter:https://twitter.com/mijinkomaster-------------------------------------------------------
